name: Spice Blocks
author: Spicethemes

sections.description:
Spice Blocks Plugin is a block plugin that is compatible with all WordPress themes. In plugin block controls are given, that’s help to develop a beautiful WordPress theme.

Key Features

  • Heading
  • Editor
  • Divider
  • Button
  • Spacer
  • Icon
  • Section
  • Column
  • Image
  • Blockquote
  • Call To Action
  • Timeline
  • Accordion
  • Icon List
  • Image Comparison
  • Image Gallery
  • Image Accordion
  • Progress Bar
  • Service Box
  • Social Icons

sections.installation:
1. Upload spice-blocks.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and extract.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins > Installed Plugins menu in WordPress dashboard.
  3. Done!
sections.changelog:
@Version 2.0.2
* Added Stacked Card blocks in the pro plugin.

@Version 2.0.1
* Fixed style issues.

@Version 2.0
* Updated freemius directory.

@Version 1.3.4
* Added default auto value for margin control in Section & Column Settings.

@Version 1.3.3
* Added Id attribute in Additional Settings.

@Version 1.3.2
* Added enable alpha in block’s color settings for opacity.

@Version 1.3.1
* Fixed issues related to WordPress version 6.4.1.

@Version 1.3
* Updated freemius directory.

@Version 1.2.1
* Fixed issues related to the site editor.
* Fixed issues Icon & Social icon blocks.

@Version 1.2
* Added import library feature.
* Added Additional settings for custom CSS & updated font-family control.

@Version 1.1
* Added Service & Social Icon blocks.

@Version 1.0
* Added Timeline, Accordion, Icon List, Image Comparison, Image Gallery, Image Accordion, Progress Bar blocks.

@Version 0.3
* Added Spice Button, Spice Spacer, Spice Icon, Spice Section, Spice Column, Spice Image, Spice Blockquote, and Spice Call To Action blocks.

@Version 0.2
* Fixed issues mentioned by the reviewer.

@Version 0.1
* Initial Release.
